org.smartfrog.services.display
Interface Headless

All Superinterfaces:
Condition, java.rmi.Remote
All Known Implementing Classes:
HeadlessImpl
public interface Headless
extends Condition

A condition that can be used to evaluate or set the headless state of a machine

Field Summary
static java.lang.String ATTR_HEADLESS
          headless attribute: this is true when the system is headless.

Method Detail

setHeadless

void setHeadless(boolean headless)
                 throws java.rmi.RemoteException
Set the headless flag on the remote machine. Setting the headless attribute has the same effect

Parameters:
headless - should the machine be set to headless or not?
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException - network problems
